mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUEUE_LOGS(QLOG_ID, QLOG_CONTACT, QLOG_DATE, QLST_CODE) values(QUEUE_LOGS_QLOG_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{qlog_contact}, SYSDATE, #{qlst_code)
mapper.select: SELECT QLOG_ID, QLOG_CONTACT, QLOG_DATE, QLST_CODE FROM QUEUE_LOGS WHERE QLOG_ID = #{qlog_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE QUEUE_LOGS SET QLOG_CONTACT = #{qlog_contact}, QLOG_DATE = #{qlog_date}, QLST_CODE = #{qlst_code} WHERE QLOG_ID = #{qlog_id}
